_sText:
**CSGO SERVER OWNERS - DOWNLOAD SURF_MOTION1_CSGO FROM THE STEAM WORKSHOP: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=462338926**

**[CS:GO]Troflecopter's WR**: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TnCZ55B2nSk

(_surf motion1 has not been ported to CS:GO by me, so I don't have a download link to it. You should go to CGN surf servers if you want to play it, because as far as I know they are the ones that ported it_).

The map has been edited again to make it a bit easier, the purpose of this map was t4-t5 but it turned out t6 before, now it should be fine. The map has been renamed to surf_motion1 as I will propably create surf_motion2 in the future.

So, this is a linear surf map, surfing it takes about 1 minute.

Things that have been made in this version:
#Green "stage"
- Nothing has been changed,

#Blue "stage"
- Made the spin a bit easier,
- Replaced the first bhop parts with ramps,
- Made the last bhop part easier to do on high ping,

#Yellow "stage"
- Made the first jump easier,
- Fixed the boost near the end so you can have more control on the ramp,

#White "stage"
- Nothing has been changed,

#Orange "stage"
- The whole stage has been remade (excluding the first ramp),

#Red "stage"
- Everything has been remade until the first spin,
- Made the ending easier (bigger gaps between the "columns",
